titleStmt.title: The Quakers court of justice, laid open to publick view. With a discovery of several of their errors in principle and practice. And also certain rules and directions for all those that are desirous to be admitted into the Society of the Quakers, being very easie to be attained unto. With several remarkable passages worth your observation.

The Quakers court of justice, laid open to publick view. With a discovery of several of their errors in principle and practice. And also certain rules and directions for all those that are desirous to be admitted into the Society of the Quakers, being very easie to be attained unto. With several remarkable passages worth your observation.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Haverford College Library.
